page.title: 20ST.MICHAEL'S HALL
page.content: St.Michael's Hall in Yeovil is a sort of community and sports centre.People can do most sports here,including Judo.There are many different courts eg:-Netball,Basketball,Tennis and Badminton.All the courts are indoors and have wooden floors.Exercise,diet and gymnastic classes are held here including weight lifting. Mudford Recreation centre has a seven lane track,400m 'dri pla' and is constructed to full international standard.Synthetic run ups are provided for the field events,changing facilities and hot water showers.On the site are soccer,hockey,rugby and football pitches and three cricket squares.The facilities are used by the local schools and by Yeovil Tertiary College in the day,and by clubs or individuals in the evenings.The charges are high,to pay for the recent
